tournament.name: Star City Games Legacy Kansas City

decks.notes: The main concept of this deck is to flood the board with aggressive goblins as quickly as possible in order to overwhelm the opponent and deal damage as efficiently as possible. The deck focuses on utilizing cards like Goblin Lackey and Goblin Matron to quickly search for and put goblins into play, while also using cards like Goblin Warchief and Goblin Chieftain to buff the entire board. Furthermore, cards like Aether Vial and Gempalm Incinerator provide additional utility and removal options to help maintain tempo and control the game.

The focus of this deck is to quickly establish a board presence with powerful Merfolk creatures and disrupt the opponent's game plan with powerful counterspells. By utilizing Aether Vial to cheat creatures into play, alongside Lord of Atlantis to buff them, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures. Standstill is used to slow down the opponent while still allowing the Merfolk player to develop their board. The deck also includes a full suite of disruptive counterspells to protect its creatures and maintain control of the game.

The primary focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a swarm of aggressive Goblin creatures, taking advantage of synergistic abilities and tribal support cards. Using Aether Vial to cheat creatures into play, key Goblins like Goblin Lackey and Goblin Matron can quickly put pressure on the opponent. With a mix of card draw and removal spells like Gempalm Incinerator and Warren Weirding, this deck aims to establish board dominance and keep the pressure on the opponent to win the game quickly through aggressive creature attacks.

This deck focuses on disrupting your opponent's plays with cards like Gaddock Teeg and Mangara of Corondor while also putting pressure on them with efficient creatures like Knight of the Reliquary and Tarmogoyf. By utilizing Aether Vial to cheat creatures into play and Stoneforge Mystic to fetch powerful equipment like Umezawa's Jitte and Sword of Fire and Ice, the deck can quickly overwhelm opponents. Additionally, the inclusion of cards like Swords to Plowshares and Qasali Pridemage provides removal and answers to opposing threats. This deck aims to be proactive in its strategy while still disrupting the opponent's game plan.

The main concept of this deck is to control the game through a combination of disruption cards like Hymn to Tourach and Thoughtseize, removal spells like Swords to Plowshares and Vindicate, and strong creatures like Dark Confidant, Knight of the Reliquary, and Tarmogoyf. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while building up its own resources through cards like Mox Diamond and Sensei's Divining Top. The mana base is designed to support the deck's color requirements and provide utility lands like Wasteland and Karakas. The overall strategy is to outlast the opponent through efficient control and resource management.

This deck focuses on utilizing aggressive creatures and disruptive spells to control the game and apply pressure on the opponent. By combining powerful equipment such as Swords and Jitte with creatures like Serra Avenger and Dark Confidant, the deck aims to quickly close out games while disrupting the opponent's game plan with cards like Thoughtseize and Tidehollow Sculler. The mana base is streamlined and efficient, allowing for consistent casting of spells and applying pressure through land destruction with Wasteland.

The key concept of this deck is to control the game through a combination of counterspells, card filtering, and the Counterbalance and Sensei's Divining Top combo. By manipulating the top card of the library with Sensei's Divining Top, the player can counter spells of the same converted mana cost with Counterbalance. The deck also has the ability to quickly ramp into threats like Tarmogoyf and Progenitus with mana dorks like Noble Hierarch and ramp spells like Natural Order. The deck aims to out-value and out-control the opponent to secure victory.

The deck focuses on a fast-paced aggressive strategy that utilizes cheap artifacts to overwhelm the opponent with early threats. By efficiently playing out a large number of creatures and utilizing cards like Cranial Plating and Arcbound Ravager to pump up their creatures, the deck aims to quickly close out the game before the opponent can establish their own game plan. This deck excels at putting immense pressure on the opponent from the beginning and leveraging the synergy between its artifacts to secure a victory.

The main focus of this deck is to control the opponent's plays through a combination of counterspells, removal, and card advantage tools like Dark Confidant and Jace, the Mind Sculptor. The deck utilizes the Counterbalance and Sensei's Divining Top combo to counter spells efficiently and maintain board control. It also includes efficient threats like Tarmogoyf and Noble Hierarch to pressure the opponent while disrupting their game plan. The deck aims to outvalue and outmaneuver the opponent through careful resource management and strategic play.

This deck focuses on using powerful disruption spells like Thoughtseize and Hymn to Tourach to control the opponent's hand while using efficient removal like Swords to Plowshares and Vindicate to keep the board under control. The deck also utilizes strong creatures like Dark Confidant, Knight of the Reliquary, and Tarmogoyf to apply pressure and close out the game. The mana base includes a mix of dual lands and utility lands to ensure consistent color access and the ability to disrupt the opponent's mana base with cards like Wasteland.

The main idea behind this Legacy Merfolk deck is to use Aether Vial to quickly deploy creatures like Coralhelm Commander, Merrow Reejerey, and Lord of Atlantis to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive board presence. Cards like Cursecatcher and Kira, Great Glass-Spinner help protect your creatures, while Standstill and Wasteland disrupt the opponent's game plan. With a focus on tempo and disruption, this deck aims to control the game and outpace the opponent with its efficient and powerful Merfolk creatures.

This deck focuses on controlling the game by utilizing a combination of countermagic, removal spells, and powerful creatures. The key strategy involves disrupting the opponent's game plan with cards like Daze, Force of Will, and Stifle, while also efficiently dealing with threats using Swords to Plowshares. The deck includes powerful threats like Knight of the Reliquary, Tarmogoyf, and Terravore to close out the game and offers card advantage and selection with Brainstorm and Jace, the Mind Sculptor. Horizon Canopy provides additional card draw while Wasteland helps disrupt the opponent's mana base.

The focus of this deck is to generate large amounts of mana through High Tide and untap effects like Turnabout, allowing for explosive plays and potentially milling the opponent with Brain Freeze or drawing large quantities of cards with Stroke of Genius. The deck includes protection in the form of Force of Will and access to versatile cards like Cunning Wish to search for answers or win conditions. Merchant Scroll and cantrips like Brainstorm, Ponder, and Preordain help dig for key pieces while keeping the deck consistent. The win condition can also be achieved with Emrakul, the Aeons Torn.

This deck focuses on utilizing efficient creatures like Nantuko Shade, Tarmogoyf, Vampire Nighthawk, and Tombstalker to apply constant pressure and end the game quickly. It also includes disruptive elements like Hymn to Tourach, Inquisition of Kozilek, and Thoughtseize to disrupt the opponent's plans and remove key threats. With access to powerful black spells like Dark Ritual, Smother, and Snuff Out, the deck aims to control the board and destroy the opponent's resources. The land base includes a combination of Swamp, Forest, Bayou, Marsh Flats, Verdant Catacombs, and Wasteland to ensure consistent mana production and disruption.

The main focus of this deck is to utilize the Dredge mechanic to quickly fill the graveyard with cards and generate value through recursion. By sacrificing creatures like Golgari Grave-Troll and Golgari Thug and utilizing cards such as Bridge from Below and Dread Return, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a powerful army of creatures. The inclusion of cards like Cabal Therapy and Careful Study further helps in filling the graveyard efficiently. Overall, the deck aims to create a high-powered board state and disrupt the opponent's game plan through its unique combo strategy.

The main concept of this Legacy 1 vs 1 Combo - Painter deck is to use Grindstone and Painter's Servant to mill opponent's library quickly and win the game. The deck is built around assembling the combo pieces as fast as possible using cards like Goblin Welder, Trinket Mage, and Intuition while protecting the combo with countermagic like Force of Will. The deck also includes card draw and manipulation tools like Brainstorm and Sensei's Divining Top to find the combo pieces efficiently. The deck aims to win the game in a fast and efficient manner through its combo strategy.
